name: openvpn
description: OpenVPN server and REST admin interface
preInstallNotes:
Community packages are unverified and unreviewed content from the community.
This release supercedes and merges both the openvpn and openvpn-admin 0.0.0-0.1 packages.
Please remove the openvpn-admin package if installed.
New features include basic auth, TLS and Zookeeper znode ACL.
 Please ensure you configure the ovpn_username and ovpn_password environment variables before deployment,
as these are essential for access control to the REST interface and Zookeeper.
Please read the installation notes on https://github.com/dcos-labs/dcos-openvpn.
postInstallNotes:
OpenVPN has been successfully installed.
Please review https://github.com/dcos-labs/dcos-openvpn for deployment and usage documentation.
postUninstallNotes:
OpenVPN has been uninstalled.
Please review https://github.com/dcos-labs/dcos-openvpn on how to remove persisted state.
